nodes.text: Ant-flies were creatures eaten by many Ithorians after they metamorphosized. They were sometimes compared to space barnacles for sticking to surfaces like blemishes.

Ant-flies were first mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical. Ant-flies were later made canonical with the publishing of Musings of an Ithorian on Hyperspace.
